comments:
Eclipse Platform, Version: 2.0, Build id: 200210171646

Doing some testing, I created a package a.y with some java files in it.
Then I renamed a.y to a.x, having Editors open of .java files in a.y.
Renaming was successfull.

Then I closed all my open editors and issued a Navigate > Backward to reopen the
last file in the navigation history.

It didn't go backwards and I found the following in the log:

This is now (I20030910) fixed in the sense that
a) you no longer get errors in .log
b) status is shown in the editor that the file no longer exists.

Feel free to write an enhancement against JDT UI which asks that the rename
refactoring also updates the navigation history and last edited file.
